THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Consultant Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 15:42 IST
 Translational Health Science and Technology Institute
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 150,000 to 150,000




FOLLOW

The Translational Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for a Consultant - Quality Assurance Position. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, BHMS, BAMS, BVSc, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Haryana.

THSTI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Consultant - Quality Assurance	01	MBBS, BDS, BHMS, BAMS, BVSc, M.Sc

Age Limit for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 45 years.

Selection Process for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 1,50,000 / per month.

Application fee for the THSTI Recruitment 2025

For OBC/ EWS candidates: Rs. 590 /-
For SC/ ST/ Women/ PwBD candidates: Rs. 118 /-
How to Apply for the THSTI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Consultant Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable)
Submit the application form and note down the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	12-08-2025
Last Date of Application	01-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
